name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toplu Mesaj Gönderici ve Zamanlayıcı | WP-Express TR

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: İsme özel WhatsApp mesajlarını binlerce kişiye belirli aralıklarla otomatik gönderebileceğiniz güçlü bir mesajlaşma uzantısı.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WP-Express: Bulk Message Sender and Scheduler for WhatsApp
Boost your productivity and save time with WP-Express, the ultimate WhatsApp bulk messaging tool designed for businesses, marketers, educators, and individuals. This powerful extension allows you to automate, personalize, and schedule WhatsApp messages to thousands of contacts effortlessly.

Whether you're running promotional campaigns, sending reminders, or sharing updates, WP-Express streamlines the process, making communication faster, smarter, and more efficient.

Key Features:
Automated Bulk Messaging
Send thousands of messages automatically with a single click. Perfect for handling large-scale communications without manual effort.

Personalized Messages
Customize each message with placeholders like NAME to create a personal touch for your audience.

Excel File Integration
Upload .xlsx files directly into the extension. Easily manage your contact lists and ensure accurate message delivery.

Flexible Scheduling
Set intervals between messages (1 to 10 minutes) to comply with WhatsApp's best practices and avoid spamming.

Customizable Message Templates
Use pre-designed templates or create your own. Add emojis and random endings to make your messages engaging.

Pause, Resume, and Stop Options
Gain full control over your campaigns. Stop or resume sending messages at any time without losing progress.

Real-Time Updates
Track the number of messages sent, remaining contacts, and progress in real time through the intuitive interface.

License Activation System
Secure your extension with a built-in license activation process, ensuring controlled access for authorized users only.

Error Handling
Automatically skips invalid numbers, saving you time and ensuring accurate delivery.

Why Choose WP-Express?
Streamlined Communication: Handle all your bulk messaging needs with ease.
High Efficiency: Save hours of manual effort by automating repetitive tasks.
Customizable and Flexible: Tailor every aspect of your messages to suit your audience.
User-Friendly Design: Intuitive interface powered by Bootstrap for effortless navigation.
Global Compatibility: Works seamlessly with WhatsApp Web for worldwide reach.
Who Can Benefit from WP-Express?
Marketers and Advertisers: Launch promotional campaigns, announce discounts, and increase customer engagement.
Small Business Owners: Send appointment reminders, order confirmations, and personalized messages to clients.
Educators and Institutions: Share updates, schedules, and important notices with students and parents.
Event Planners: Manage RSVPs and share event details in bulk.
Anyone: Automate personal messages like birthday wishes or festival greetings.
Technical Specifications:
Built with Manifest V3: Ensures compliance with Chrome Web Store policies.
Secure and Reliable: Operates within WhatsApp Web's ecosystem using Chrome's advanced security standards.
Efficient Storage Usage: Saves session data locally for better performance.
